name: Sound Effects
description: Non-musical audio works, including recorded sounds and sounds recreated synthetically or by other means, which are either sounds of known objects or abstract noise manifestations.

sub_genres.name: Battle Record
sub_genres.description: Compilations of sounds, samples, and beats pressed on vinyl records for use in DJ performances.

sub_genres.name: Binaural Beats
sub_genres.description: Auditory illusions created when two different frequencies are played simultaneously in separate ears.

sub_genres.name: Broadband Noise
sub_genres.description: Audio signals with energy distributed across a wide range of frequencies; usually split into "colours" of noise and often marketed for relaxation or as a sleep aid.
